text: League of Super Evil is a Canadian animated comedy television series. It was co-created by Philippe Ivanusic-Vallee, Davila LeBlanc and Peter Ricq and developed by Asaph Fipke. It was inspired by a comedy sketch entitled "Once Were Heroes" by Ryan Harper-Brown. It was produced by Nerd Corps Entertainment in association with YTV. It aired from March 7, 2009 to August 25, 2012. Category:2009 Canadian television series debuts Category:2012 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian animated television series
title: League of Super Evil
